constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.description: 每次操作时，选择一个数x划掉，并任选一个正整数a，在划掉之后需要再写上x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a共K个数，且a需满足x-K*a >= 0。若这样的a不存在，则不能划掉这个数。
constraints.formal: For each operation, choose an integer x and a positive integer a such that x - K * a >= 0. Replace x with x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a. If no such a exists, the player cannot perform this operation.

constraints.name: game_termination
constraints.description: 当某个人无法操作时则失败，另一方获得胜利。
constraints.formal: The game ends when a player cannot make a valid move, and the other player wins.

constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.description: 每次操作时，选择一个数x划掉，并任选一个正整数a，在划掉之后需要再写上x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a共K个数，且a需满足x-K*a >= 0。若这样的a不存在，则不能划掉这个数。
constraints.formal: For each operation, choose an integer x and a positive integer a such that x - K * a >= 0. Replace x with x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a. If no such a exists, the number cannot be removed.

constraints.name: game_termination
constraints.description: 当某个人无法进行操作时，该玩家失败，另一方获得胜利。
constraints.formal: The game ends when a player cannot make a valid move, and that player loses.

constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.description: 每次操作时，选择一个数x划掉，并任选一个正整数a，在划掉之后需要再写上x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a共K个数，且a需满足x-K*a >= 0。若这样的a不存在，则不能划掉这个数。
constraints.formal: For each operation, choose an integer x and a positive integer a such that x - K * a >= 0. Then, replace x with the sequence x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a. If no such a exists, the number cannot be removed.

constraints.name: game_termination
constraints.description: 当某个人无法进行有效操作时（即找不到满足条件的a），则该人失败，另一方获胜。
constraints.formal: The game ends when a player cannot make a valid move (i.e., no a satisfies the condition). The player who cannot move loses, and the other player wins.

result.description: 判断先手是否必胜，输出结果为 Preempt.（先手必胜）、Leapfrog.（后手必胜）或 Je suis un imbecile.（两者皆非）
判断先手是否必胜，后手是否必胜，或两者皆非
判断先手是否必胜，后手是否必胜，或两者皆非

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 游戏的胜负状态可以通过子问题（即较小的石子堆）的胜负状态来确定，体现了最优子结构的性质。

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 游戏的胜负状态可以通过子问题（即较小规模的游戏）的胜负状态来确定，符合动态规划中的最优子结构特性。

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 游戏的胜负状态可以通过子问题（即较小规模的游戏状态）的胜负状态来确定，符合动态规划中的最优子结构性质。
